body.name: Elviros 8 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress King Size, Cooling Bed Mattress for Adjustable Firmness, Bed in a Box, Foam Mattress with Removable Cover/CertiPUR-US Certified Foam
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 40 mins
features: 【5 Targeted Comfort Zones, Wake Up Refreshed】Designed with wave and eggshell contours, the 8" gel memory foam mattress provides targeted support for key body areas: head, neck, shoulders, lumbar, hips, and knees. Enjoy a restful night and the ultimate sleep experience without the discomfort of tossing and turning.

【2 in 1 Firmness Design, Enjoy Different Firm Feel】 Elviros' 8'' foam mattress offers two firmness options to tackle mattress hardness issues. The blue layer has cooling gel memory foam for body contouring and pressure distribution. The gray layer ensures spine alignment with high-density support foam.

【Cooling and Breathable, Ensure Temperature-regulated sleep】 To keep a balanced temperature for a better night’s sleep, the gel mattress adopts cooling-gel infused memory foam layer paired with a gentle ice-silk cover, absorbing excess heat while you sleep. The airflow channels distributed in foam core and breathable side mesh increase air circulation, boosting breathability and heat dissipation.

【Two fabrics, one goal: Pleasing every consumer!】 To meet consumer needs, this foam mattress has a dual-fabric design. The shell-patterned ice-silk fabric with cool feeling perfect for hot summer nights, while the other presents a diamond-quilted skin-friendly fabric suitable for all seasons, catering to different temperature preferences. Moreover, our bed mattress materials are certified by both CERTIPUR-US and OEKO-TEX Standard 100, ensuring a full night's restful sleep.

【Quality Assurance & Customer Service】 We provide a 10-Year Warranty for quality concerns. Contact our customer service for any issues. Please note that due to vacuum compression, WAIT FOR 48 HOURS until it fully expands. Also, as a freshly manufactured product, it may carry a slight harmless odor which typically dissipates within 2-7 days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5-Zone Comfort, Superior Joint Support This innovative design ensures each zone conforms to different parts of the body with specific support and pressure relief, while simultaneously cradling the spine. Regardless of your preferred sleeping position, you can always experience comfortable and relaxing sleep.
Double-Sided Firmness Mattress: Soft or Firm, Your Choice

Adjustable Firmness: Flip for Your Preferred Comfort Level Firmness is adjustable by flipping the mattress to the preferred side. There are two easy ways to enjoy a mattress with two levels of firmness, making it perfect for home use. Mattress Setup: Unroll, Expand, and Enjoy The mattress, compressed and packed in a box, is delivered to your home. Simple unboxing steps easily let you enjoy the comfort that Elviros mattress offers. Removable & Washable Mattress Cover Elviros mattress cover can be easily taken off, and keeps your bed clean more easily. No more worrying about spills, dust and dander!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Move over, TempurPedic!
reviews.reviewText: Love, love, love this mattress! I have a $2000 TempurPedic at another home, and this one is just as comfortable. I did a lot of research and reading of reviews before buying, and this one lives up to all the good reviews. Absolutely NO smell, and within minutes of unrolling it was expanded to full height, evenly and all around. Could have slept on it immediately. With two sleeping surfaces giving options for degree of firmness, we prefer the softer side. We are average-sized people (140lb and 180lb) and after 3 weeks of sleeping, no signs of depressions in the foam. My only minor criticism is that the cover is slippery, my Allergen mattress protector slides around on it a little. Nothing a new protector won’t solve, I hope.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after multiple failed attempts at other mattresses because I needed something that would work with the adjustable base that I bought. I instantly fell in love with this mattress it’s super comfortable and I love that it has one side firm, and one side softer as I myself prefer a soft bed and my partner prefers a firm bed so whenever they’re around all I have to do is flip the mattress over. The only downside that I can see is the fine print on your warranty. Make sure you keep this double covered at all times. Otherwise you cannot get any service on it should it fail or need to be replaced. They will not service it if it has any stains or has gotten wet, thankfully I had a secondary mattress protector on hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It sprung up fully much faster than I expected. Very comfortable. Springs up quickly after getting up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mattress, very firm!
reviews.reviewText: The mattress was ready within minutes after opening the vacuum sealed packaging. Did not have an odor, no issues. That being said…it is VERY FIRM, and I’m saying that as someone who likes a firm mattress. But it’s not my bed - it is for my sons room and he doesn’t care, he likes it, but when he jumps into bed it’s more like a thud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this mattress
reviews.reviewText: This mattress arrived quickly and was packaged well. There was no smell. I allowed it three days to fully "inflate", as it comes vacuumed packaged. It is comfortable and allows you the option of having a soft surface or flip it over for medium support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mattress. I hope it lasts for years.
